titles.title: To modify the navigation project for the Thames River, Connecticut to alter the dimensions of a turning basin in Norwich, Connecticut.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/7/1995--Introduced. Reconfigures the turning basin of the Thames River, Connecticut, navigation project in accordance with a specified alignment. Requires any required initial dredging of the widened portions of the basin to be accomplished at non-Federal expense. Deauthorizes the portions of the existing basin that are not included in the reconfigured basin.
